00021   /**
00022    * \brief Return true with probability 1/\e e.
00023    *
00024    * InverseEProb p; p(Random& r) returns true with prob 1/e using von
00025    * Neumann's rejection method.  It consumes 4.572 bits per call on average.
00026    *
00027    * This class illustrates how to return an exact result using coin tosses
00028    * only.  A more efficient way of returning an exact result would be to use
00029    * ExponentialProb p; p(r, 1.0f);
00030    **********************************************************************/
00031   class InverseEProb {
00032   private:
00033     mutable std::vector<bool> _p;
00034     template<class Random> bool exph(Random& r) {
00035       // Return true with prob 1/sqrt(e).
00036       if (r.Boolean()) return true;
00037       _p.clear();                      // vector of bits in p
00038       _p.push_back(false);
00039       for (bool s = false; ; s = !s) { // s is a parity
00040         for (size_t i = 0; ; ++i) {    // Compare bits of p and q
00041           if (i == _p.size())
00042             _p.push_back(r.Boolean()); // Generate next bit of p if necessary
00043           if (r.Boolean()) {           // Half the time the bits differ
00044             if (_p[i]) {        // p's bit is 1, so q is smaller, update p
00045               _p[i] = false;    // Last bit of q 0
00046               if (++i < _p.size()) _p.resize(i); // p = q
00047               break;
00048             } else
00049               return s;         // p's bit is 0, so q is bigger, return parity
00050           } // The other half of the time the bits match, so go to next bit
00051         }
00052       }
00053     }
00054   public:
00055     /**
00056      * Return true with probability 1/\e e.
00057      *
00058      * @tparam Random the type of the random generator.
00059      * @param[in,out] r a random generator.
00060      * @return true with probability 1/\e e.
00061      **********************************************************************/
00062     template<class Random> bool operator()(Random& r)
00063     { return exph(r) && exph(r); }
00064   };
